headline: Tech Mahindra Global Chess League Joins Forces with AMD to Build High-Performance Infrastructure for Season 3 in Mumbai
summary: The Global Chess League (GCL), a joint initiative of Tech Mahindra and FIDE, is collaborating with AMD, the leader in high-performance computing, to strengthen the league's technology infrastructure for Season 3. AMD's cutting-edge processing power and graphics performance will help deliver seamless gameplay, broadcast outputs, and the next level of immersive fan experiences. GCL Season 3 will take place from December 13 to 24, 2025, at Mumbai's iconic Royal Opera House.
